  4. Opinion: Anti-money laundering watchdog FATF needs to blacklist Russia  Kyiv Independent
  5. Lengthening the world’s dirty-money list  The Economist

item.title: Iran warns America’s ‘limited’ THAAD missile system not enough to protect Israel: ‘We will destroy you’ - New York Post
item.description:
1. Iran warns America’s ‘limited’ THAAD missile system not enough to protect Israel: ‘We will destroy you’  New York Post

  3. Iran readying for war with Israel as it braces for response to missile attack — NYT  The Times of Israel
  4. 'Don't count on THAAD' for protection: IRGC issues renewed threats to Israel  The Jerusalem Post
  5. Report: Iran Preparing Responses to Possible Israeli Attack, Scope Will Depend of Severity of Strike  Haaretz
